data.proxyObjectName: gray fabric messenger bag with zipper pocket and adjustable shoulder strap
data.utilizationMethod: Lay the bag flat on the table so the largest fabric panel faces upward; sweep the tweezers across the fabric surface in broad strokes.

data.proxyObjectName: red Shin Ramyun instant noodle packet
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the center of the packet between thumb and fingers and squeeze the flexible bag, letting the contents shift while pressing from one end toward the other

data.proxyObjectName: green round retractable measuring tape with partially extended beige tape
data.utilizationMethod: Hold the circular housing in the hand and repeatedly press the central round release button with the index finger

data.proxyObjectName: white plastic adjustable desk lamp with circular head
data.utilizationMethod: Grasp the slim vertical stem just below the circular head with one hand, lift the lamp off the surface, and swing so the circular head leads the motion

data.proxyObjectName: long metal flat-head screwdriver with a translucent red handle
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the metal shaft just above the handle between thumb and first two fingers so the handle projects upward and the flat tip points downward, then rotate the shaft between fingertips
Close the tips together, hold the blunt end like a pencil, and glide the closed tips across a surface in controlled strokes

data.proxyObjectName: silver and black Olympus PEN film camera
data.utilizationMethod: Set the camera flat with its metal top plate upward; target the solid lens cap area with the screwdriver tip while applying rotational pressure

data.proxyObjectName: green-and-white pack of wet wipes with a single white tissue sheet protruding
data.utilizationMethod: Grab one narrow end of the pack with a relaxed power grip, point the protruding tissue forward, and perform forearm-driven arcs
